scripts.bundle-android: rm -rf dist-android && mkdir dist-android && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./dist-android/index.jsbundle --platform android --assets-dest ./dist-android --dev false
scripts.bundle-ios: rm -rf dist-ios && mkdir dist-ios && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./dist-ios/index.jsbundle  --platform ios --assets-dest ./dist-ios --dev false
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-ios && npm run bundle-android
